name: FaceGen Project File
summary: Learn about .FG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FG files can be exported to many different 3D formats, including 3D Studio, Lightwave, Maya, Softimage, .VRML, Wavefront .OBJ, and .STL formats.

description: Project file created by FaceGen, a program used to create 3D human faces; stores all facial feature settings, camera angles, and morphs, which are expressions such as fear, anger, and disgust; commonly used for storing video game character designs.
